front.title: BGP AS_PATH Verification Based on Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RPKI) Autonomous System Provider Authorization (ASPA) Objects

abstract.t: This document defines the semantics of an Autonomous System Provider Authorization object in the Resource Public Key Infrastructure to verify the AS_PATH attribute of routes advertised in the Border Gateway Protocol. This AS_PATH verification is primarily intended for detection and mitigation of route leaks. It also provides protection against forged-origin prefix hijacks.
